subject: Arbitration, Conciliation and Mediation
Wages and Salaries
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Oliver Pérez will make $6.5 million, a hefty raise from last year’s $2.325 million. The Mets’ offer for this season has been $4.725 million.
snippet: Oliver Pérez will make $6.5 million, a hefty raise from last year’s $2.325 million. The Mets’ offer for this season has been $4.725 million.
